channel.title: Adding ::checkbank error [PI]
channel.description:
Using: [code]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,491131.0/all.html[/code]
I get: [code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1038: cannot find symbol symbol : class player location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands for(player a : PlayerHandler.players){ ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1052: cannot find symbol symbol : method loadCharBank(java.lang.String) location: class server.model.players.Client if(!c.loadCharBank(name)){ ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
If somebody could help.. it'd be very useful..

item.title: Adding ::checkbank error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Brid_Mayhem_1 Brid Mayhem #1
item.description:
@Brid_Mayhem_1 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:431965”]Delete everything you did and add this in commands:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) { c.getPA().otherBank(c, o); break; } } } } [/quote]

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1033: cannot find symbol symbol : method otherBank(server.model.players.Client,server.model.players.Clie nt) location: class server.model.players.PlayerAssistant c.getPA().other Bank(c, o); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Adding ::checkbank error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Delete everything you did and add this in commands:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) {
                                String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
                                for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++)
                                {
                                        Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
                                        if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null)
                                        {
                                                if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1]))
                                                {
                                                                 c.getPA().otherBank(c, o);
                                                break;
                                                }
                                        }
                                }
                        }

Read full topic

item.title: Adding ::checkbank error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

make

to

and you’re missing the loadCharBank method, or you didn’t import the class that the method is in.
